function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to aerosolized viruses","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission and infection","Mitigation":"Use of far-UVC light at 222 nm to inactivate airborne viruses","Technologies":"Filtered excimer lamps for generating single-wavelength far-UVC light at 222 nm","People":"Individuals in indoor environments","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"High transmission potential of coronaviruses","Impact":"Potential for rapid spread and increased infection rates","Mitigation":"Development and deployment of effective countermeasures to reduce indoor person-to-person transmission","Technologies":"Far-UVC light at 222 nm","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Risk of biological damage from UV light","Impact":"Potential harm to exposed human cells and tissue","Mitigation":"Use of filtered excimer lamps to minimize biological damage","Technologies":"Filtered excimer lamps for generating far-UVC light at 222 nm","People":"Individuals exposed to UV light","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners"}]}
